## Classes Index

<MembersIndex>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="struct"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/tablegen/emitter/opt">Opt</a></>}>
Creating an <code><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/tablegen/emitter/opt">Opt</a></code> object registers the command line option <code>Name</code> with <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/tablegen">TableGen</a> backend and associates the callback <code>CB</code> with that option. <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/tablegen/emitter/opt/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/tablegen/emitter/optclass">OptClass&lt;EmitterC&gt;</a></>}>
Convienence wrapper around <code><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/tablegen/emitter/opt">Opt</a></code> that registers <code>EmitterClass::run</code> as the callback. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/tablegen/emitter/optclass/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>
